description: Hearing that his ex-roomie Mathias has recently split with his girl, Carter Woods can't help but remind him of the way it was when it was just the two of them. Mathias smiles at the memory, telling Carter he enjoyed it, but the past is the past. Carter tells Mathias that he enjoyed it as well, and as they exchange glances, it all comes back- the passionate sucking and fucking that they gave each other, and the massive loads they spit all over each other, safe from the worry and strings that come with dating women. Mathias smiles at the memory, and Carter tells him it doesn't just have to be part of the past...Enjoy!
title: Perfect Buddies
